remarks: A walk of length 2 between two different vertices as ordered triple corresponds to a simple path of length 2 in an undirected simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 16-Feb-2018.)
statement:
usg2wotspth $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) /\ A =/= C ) -> ( <. A , B , C >. e. ( A ( V 2WalksOnOt E ) C ) <-> E. f E. p ( f ( V SPaths E ) p /\ ( # ` f ) = 2 /\ ( A = ( p ` 0 ) /\ B = ( p ` 1 ) /\ C = ( p ` 2 ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A f p $.
$d B f p $.
$d C f p $.
$d E f p $.
$d V f p $.
